a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Two sources of data on tax revenue as share of GDP, United States,
Comparison of the OECD's Global Revenue Statistics Database and the UNU-WIDER's Global Revenue Database. Both
series correspond to total taxes collected by the government as percentage of GDP.
Data source: OECD (2018); UNU-WIDER Government Revenue Dataset (2023)
